page.title: 11 A VISIT TO STRATFORD MARKET
page.content: WE WERE GREETED BY THE STRONG SMELL OF FISH ON ARRIVING AT THE MARKET. ROTHER STREET HAD BECOME LIKE A HIVE OF BEES.THE MARKET IS QUITE CENTRALLY SITUATED IN THE TOWN.LOCALS AND OUT- SIDERS FIND IT CONVENIENT FOR THEM, SINCE THERE IS A WIDE RANGE OF DAILY ITEMS AVAILABLE,EG.CLOTHES(UNDERWEAR, DRESSES,CHILDRENS' CLOTHES,ETC),SHOES, MATERIALS AND FABRICS,JEWELLERY,NEEDLE- WORK(COTTON,LACE,ZIP-FASTENERS,ETC), LEATHER AND SKIN PRODUCTS,THINGS FOR THE HOME(PICTURES,PLANTS,CROCKERY,TOYS, ORNAMENTS,HARDWARE,WICKERWORK,FLOWERS), BIRTHDAY CARDS,AND FOOD(MEAT,FISH,FRUIT AND VEGETABLES,DAIRY PRODUCTS,PET FOOD AND HEALTH FOOD). THE STALL-HOLDERS COME FROM NEIGH- BOURING TOWNS EG.REDDITCH AND BIRMINGHAM,BUT MANY OF THEM ARE CENTRED IN OR NEAR TO STRATFORD ITSELF.
